topic.title: Join a Meeting as a Registered User

body.p: As a registered user, you can join a meeting directly from the meeting invite received in Outlook or the Join now message received in MiCollab chat, or by clicking on the meeting from the My meetings section of your MiTeam Meetings application.
body.note: For a meeting to be displayed in your My meetings section, you must have joined that meeting at least once.
body.p: To join a meeting directly from the meeting invite or the Join now message in MiCollab chat, use the following procedure:

ol.li:
Click the meeting invite link or the Join now message. The MiTeam Meetings web page opens.
If you have the MiTeam Meetings desktop application installed, the web page will prompt you to open the desktop application. For this prompt to appear, you must have selected the Always launch meetings links in desktop app check box in the Settings menu of the desktop application.
To select the Always launch meetings links in desktop app check box, use the following steps:
Open the MiTeam Meetings desktop application.
Click your Avatar.
Click Settings. In the General tab, select the Always launch meetings links in desktop app check box.
Click Open MiTeam Meetings to open the desktop application. The desktop application is launched, and the Welcome page opens.
If you do not want to launch the desktop application click Cancel. To continue logging in to the meeting using the web application click join from your browser.
If you do not have the desktop application installed, or have not selected the Always launch meetings links in desktop app check box, the MiTeam Meetings web application is launched, and the Welcome page opens.

li.p: Specify the audio and video setting, and click Enter now to join the meeting.
li.note: To resolve issues you face while enabling microphone, speaker, or camera, see the FAQ How do I enable the camera and the microphone for MiTeam Meetings desktop application in Windows and Mac OS? or How do I enable the camera and the microphone for MiTeam Meetings web application in a browser?.

body.p: To join a meeting listed in the My meetings section of your MiTeam Meetings application, use the following procedure:

li.p: Click the meeting you want to join. The details of the meeting are displayed in the side panel.
Click the Join now button on the panel to join as a participant. The Welcome page opens.
Specify the audio and video setting, and click Enter now to join the meeting.
li.note: To resolve issues you face while enabling microphone, speaker, or camera, see the FAQ How do I enable the camera and the microphone for MiTeam Meetings desktop application in Windows and Mac OS? or How do I enable the camera and the microphone for MiTeam Meetings web application in a browser?.
